original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1006)@</color>  召喚一個<color=#4cc769>櫻花結界</color>，並在 <color=#ccffcc>22</color> 秒內持續提升我軍士氣至全滿狀態。場上只能同時存在一個結界且新的結界會取代舊的，當結界被取代消失時效果也會跟著消失。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1006)@</color> Summon a <color=#4cc769>Sakura enchantment</color>, and put it in <color=#ccffcc>22</color> Continue to improve the morale of our army to full state within seconds. Only one enchantment can exist on the field at the same time and the new enchantment will replace the old one, and the effect will disappear when the enchantment is replaced and disappears.
